DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate if neurofeedback and working memory training improves core symptoms of ADHD in children and adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: Neurofeedback and Working Memory Training for Children and Adolescents With ADHD
DOC.criteria: Clinical AD/HD diagnose according to DSMIVTR and KSADS interview, 917 years old, unmedicated or under stable medication with stimulants or corresponding since at least one month. IQ <70 (WISCIV or WAISIV), clinically instable psychiatric state e.g. severe depression, OCD, selfinjurious behaviour, bipolar disorder, severe somatic (neurologic) disease, very limited knowledge in the Swedish language.
